imdb.plot outline: A group of misfits bonds over its struggle to qualify for an online tournament. - Against all odds,social ostracism,family feuds, and an opponent from hell. - Former football ace Mario adds the necessary dose of ambition to a group of casual online gamers when learning about the Super Bowl level price money there is at stake. Cruiser's garage converted internet café feels like Foreman's basement in 'That 70's show' half a century later and equipped with the latest work stations and gaming memorabilia. It not only serves as the war room for their online MOBA (Multiplayer Online Battle Arena) games, but also as the hideaway from the many set backs the young adults suffer in the offline world. The diverse team around the stereotypical online gamer Cruiser, the webcam celebrity and cosplayer Fanny and the self-centered and money driven newbie Mario embarks on its journey to become one of the best teams on the planet.
imdb.title: Gods of the Arena: The eSports Dramedy
akas: Gods of the Arena: The eSports Dramedy (United States)

It not only serves as the war room for their online MOBA (Multiplayer Online Battle Arena) games, but also as the hideaway from the many set backs the young adults suffer in the offline world. The diverse team around the stereotypical online gamer Cruiser, the webcam celebrity and cosplayer Fanny and the self-centered and money driven newbie Mario embarks on its journey to become one of the best teams on the planet.::Daniel Janouschek
